edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query
Class NamePathResolverImpl.NameResolverImpl

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query.NamePathResolverImpl.NameResolverImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.conversion.NameResolver
Enclosing class:
NamePathResolverImpl
private static class NamePathResolverImpl.NameResolverImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.conversion.NameResolver

Query specific NameResolver that does not assume an empty prefix for the default namespace URI. Instead the prefix is always retrieved from the NamespaceResolver.

getJCRName

public java.lang.String getJCRName(org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.Name name)
                            throws javax.jcr.NamespaceException
Returns the prefixed JCR name for the given qualified name. Note, that the JCR prefix is always retrieved from the NamespaceResolver even if the name is in the defaut namespace. This is a special treatement for query specific implementation, which defines a prefix for all namespace URIs including the default namespace.

Specified by:
getJCRName in interface org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.conversion.NameResolver
Parameters:
name - qualified name
Returns:
prefixed JCR name
Throws:
javax.jcr.NamespaceException - if the namespace URI can not be resolved
